name: 'Mad' Pat Carrik
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger • Monster • Giant
Hellbringer's Legion • Hill Giant
'Mad' Pat inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
'I've never met a Hill Giant that wasn't completely raving mad. Must be something they eat. Like slow Nothrog." - Jack Casey

name: A Touch of Power
effect:
React: Play after this wizard spends to cast a spell that is 2 or more levels lower than the wizard. Ready this wizard.
"Be warned, Aenne, lest thou dare think to question me!" - Slayer the Unkind

name: Abyss Edge
effect:
Weapon • Cursed
At the end of any turn that this character has not used the React below, this character suffers one wound.
React: Once per turn, after this chracter inflicts a wound with a melee strike, this weapon gains +1 ATK permanently.

name: Achillieus
effect:
Elf • Paladin • Undead • Death Knight
Ethereal(odd stikes miss) • If Achilleus does not have a Weapon equipped, wounds inflicted by his melee strikes may not be reduced.
React: After Achilleus hits a ready character with a melee strike, and before wounds are inflicted, spend the character.
We, who gave our lives for him long ago, follow Winter even after death.

name: Acrobatics
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll by or targeting this rogue. If this rogue has no Armor equipped, add or subtract 2 from the die roll (your choice).
"Nobody tells me where I can and cannot go, Nothrog. Send my regards to Donovan, when you see him in hell." - Keziah

name: Aeshe Wisbane
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger • Lycanthrope
Some of the children of Yscar choose to hide their heritage... for a time.

name: Ambush
effect:
Spend React: Play before another character in this rank makes a melee strike roll. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits, but the attacker must use the ATK of this character for the strike if it is lower than the ATK of his or her strike.
"Now yer learnin' how to fight to win... " - Sir Wallence

name: Amon-Selket
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Undead
Cryptgaunt • After a melee strike kills Amon-Selket, the attacker must immediately succeed with a fortitude save (DC 10) or suffer one wound.
Still wrapped in the last vestiges of their past lives, cryptgaunts spread disease and pestilence to those who disturb their rest.

name: Andover Signet
effect:
Unique
All Free Kingdoms characters in this rank add +1 to any die rolls they make.
"I will fight for what once was, and pray for what will be." - Sir Robert, Duke of Andover

name: Animate Objects
effect: Spend Order: Target a character in an opposing 1st rank, and discard any number of item cards from your hand. This cleric performs a melee strike against the target (from any rank) with an ATK equal to the combined levels of the items discarded. Items equipped by this cleric have no effect on the strike.

name: Archery Practice
effect:
Order: If this fighter succeds with an archery skill check (DC13), attach this card to the fighter.  While attached, add +2 to all ranged strike rolls made by the fighter.
"An arrow for each tooth in thy wretched smile." - Baroness Lucana

name: Arionrhod
effect:
Elf • Undead • Ethereal(odd strikes miss)
Ghost • Winter's Bride • Syneri
Arionrhod does not count as a character to prevent the rank behind from being illegal.
"I can only gaze upon her, and know what i have lost - our hands cannot touch across the barrier of death. Syneri stole her from me, but even the Archmage could not part us forever." - Winter

name: Awl Beetle
effect:
Dwarf • Monster • Rust Eater
When targeting a melee strike, Awl Beetle must target a character with Armor or Shield equipped, if it can.
React: After Awl Beetle hits a character with a melee strike, and before wounds are inflicted, select and discard one item equipped by that character.

name: Back at You!
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this fighter. Kill this fighter to inflict one wound on the attacking chracter.
"Die, but get your vengeance first." - Phar'Dunn

name: Baddrazhek
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
If Baddrazhek's AC is ever below 10, he is killed.
Order: Give Baddrazhek +3 ATK and -3 AC until the end of the turn.
"He says he's a poet. Writes his verse in blood." - Takh

name: Barrowgrim
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Barrowgrim inflicts two additional wounds when it hits with a melee strike.
Creatures of curse and blight, they feast on the fallen, dragging the bodies from the battlefield deep beneath the earth.

name: Blood Beneath Your Wings
effect:
Spend Order: Ready all other characters in play (but not this cleric).
"Welcome to Athanaes." - Behlial

name: Boot Knife
effect:
Weapon
This card may also be brought into play using the following action: "React: Equip Boot Knife to a rogue before the rogue makes a melee strike roll."
"What do you mean, you didn't search his shoes?"

name: Boots of Feather Falling
effect:
React: Spend the Boots instead of spending or stunning this character when he or she falls forward from an illegal rank.
"I can see my house from here!"

name: Breath of Ice
effect:
Necromancer only.
Spend Order: This necromancer targets a lower-level character in your discard pile. Shuffle the character into your deck.
"The Lord Winter sends his regards, your Majesty, and bids you remember the oaths your house has sworn." - Achilleus

name: Bull Rush
effect:
Spend Order: Move this fighter forward one rank. If this moves the fighter into the 1st rank, he or she may immediately perform an attack without spending. If the fighter is a Barbarian, he or she gains +3 ATK for the duration of the attack.
"Baraxton's walls stood for centuries. They've withstood Deverenian treachery and Elven magic. Yet simple Nothrog brutality made them fall." - Husuk

name: Cael Ben-Jinn
effect:
Mercenary • Summoner • Jinn
Spend React: After a melee strike, ranged strike, or action targets Cael, Move him backward one rank to cancel the action or strike.
"Your wish, my master?" the djinn said respectfully to the stupefied Nothrog, bowing to cover his smile.

name: Cause Serious Wounds
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character in an adjacent rank and makes a skill check (DC 10 + target's skill). If successful, the target suffers two wounds.
"Bascaron's blessings be upon you." - Balian

name: Clariste
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Spend React: After a wizard in this rank spends to cast a spell whose level is equal to or lower than Clariste's, ready the wizard.
"The ungrateful wench would serve the Spire no more and took to the streets, leaving only chains in her wake. Catch her, bring her to me, and i will reward you well." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Conjuration
effect:
Summoners play this as a 2nd level spell.
Spend Order: Search your deck for an item with a level less than or equal to this wizard's level +2. Show it to the other players and add it to your hand.

name: Curse of Steel
effect:
Spend Order: Discard all items in play of level 5 or less.
"Wither and die, crack and shatter. Fall from grace, die from within." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Darkhide Armor
effect:
Armor
Melee and ranged strikes that inflict more than one wound inflict only one wound against this character.
"'Took three men to make this armor,' the Nothrog smith said with a grin. I didn't ask what he meant, because I knew he'd worked alone." - Tyren Ruskin

name: Davingnon
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Undead • Assassin
Ethereal (Odd strikes miss) • Ghost
Oh, gods, Michael. I failed him... I failed the King... I failed...

name: Deverenian Coronet
effect:
Unique
All Devereniansin this rank have +1 AC and +3 Skill.
"We shall rise like the dawn, and the blood of our enemies will stain the skies of a new era." - His Imperial Majesty, Master of the Deverenian Empire, Heir of Signon and Lord of the Storm

name: Direwolf Mount
effect:
Steed
This character gains the Direwolf trait.
Order: Spend the Direwolf Mount to move forward one rank.
Order: When in the 1st rank, spend the Direwolf Mount to have it attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and ATK of +0.
As one, the wolf-riders bore down upon the village.

name: Duke Logranth
effect:
Deverenian • Logranth can cast spells as if he were a 1st level wizard.
If you quest, then you must walk past this bridge. I warn thee, beware. The beast is mine, and mine alone; I shall fight to the death to keep you from it. If you do not know its name, then you have already lost.

name: Duplicate
effect:
Spend React: Play before you put a card into play. That card may be an additional copy of a Unique card already in your army. You may not play an additional copy of a character with the printed Warlord  trait.
"Do you honestly think that any man is completely unique?" - Anton Cyldragen

name: Earth Elemental
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • You must have a cleric in your army to bring Earth Elemental into play.
Spend React: After a spell targets Earth Elemental, cancel the spell.
"They lack the basic intelligence of the gargoyles, but they're not half-bad pets if you know what to feed them." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Ebonwood
effect:
Order: Spend Ebonwood to give a character to give a character in this or an adjacent rank either +3 ATK or +3 AC until the end of the turn.
Cut from the dark heart of the forest, its sinister power can be felt by those who draw near.

name: Elven Chainmail
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
Elves equip this as a 3rd level item.
Winter sits on his throne of ice, watching in impassive sorrow as snow and cold sweep out across the world. "Father," he whispers, "how did it come to this?"

name: Encumbered
effect:
Order: Spend a character with a number of items equipped equal to or greater than his or her level. If the character was already spent, he or she is stunned.
"What do you need a ten-foot pole for, anyway?" - Timothy Windson

name: Ent Father
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Monster
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a rank in your army. Rearrange the positions of all the characters in that rank.
They live for centuries, watching patiently over the land they love. But when aroused, their anger is equally unending - and fiercer than nature's own wraith.

name: Esa
effect:
Elf • Barbarian
Order: Once per turn, Esa may subtract 3 from either his ATK or his AC and add it to the other.
"The Myreth elves speak not of their deep woods cousins - and that is best. The beasts twist flesh with their magic, shaping men into dark sculptures of pain." - Marcos Genecourt

name: Ethereal Drain
effect:
Order: This cleric tagets a character up to two ranks away. Until the end of the turn, that character is -2 levels for playing action cards.
"Power, like all other material things, can be torn away." - Elenitakis, Priest of Blood

name: Exhaustion
effect:
Spend React: Play after a character performs an action. Spend the Character.
Spend React: Play when a spent character performs an action to cancel the action.
"You think you're tired?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Face of Death
effect:
React: Play after this wizard is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike. The opposing character must succeed with a magic save (DC 12 + this wizard's level) or the strike is canceled.
"These humans have such weak spirits that they cannot bear to look upon it... " - Varg

name: Famine Harpy
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Harpy
Other Harpies have +2 AC while in the same rank as this character.
"Even worse than their sisters. These don't even bother to kill their food." - Basil Nemis

name: Fiendlings
effect:
ATK +3/+3/+3 AC 8 Skill +1 Hit Points 2
Mercenary • Monster
May only target stunned characters with melee strikes.
"The plains of Kvar were so blasted by that banshee moon that they can't support life anymore. Thus, they are forced to take it from others... " - Gaston Bonhomme

name: Flamespitter
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • May not attack.
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike. After the ranged strike resolves, perform consecutive +4 ranged strikes targeting any characters who were adjacent to the original target.
"Don't run in front of it, you idiot!" - Sethusk

name: Foeshredder
effect:
Weapon • Shield
If Foeshredder is spent, this character gains no AC bonus from it.
React: Spend Foeshredder after this character spends to attack. This character gains +4 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Follow Me
effect:
Spend Order: Ready a lower-level spent (not stunned) character in this rank. That character may not attack if he or she has already attacked this turn.
"Not far now to the Shattered Lands. We'll be safe there. Only fools would follow us." - Keridwen

name: Forced March
effect:
React: Play when a stunned character falls forward from an illegal rank. The character suffers 2 wounds.
They march across the Andoverian plains and through the hills of Llyr, steadily driving the humans into the sea.

name: Freya
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Direwolf
Packleader
Order: Once per turn, move another Direwolf in this rank forward or backward one rank.
She is a spirit that leads the wolves howling in the night; free and eternal, running through fields of endless gold.

name: From the Shadows
effect:
Spend Order: This rogue moves forward one rank. If the rogue moves into the first rank, he or she may immediately perform an attack without spending. If the rogue is an Assassin, he or she gains +4 ATK for the duration of the attack.
"For ten years i have hunted the grey elf Navdai. One by one, I kill her creations, and soon, I will have the witch as well." - Jaridesse

name: Gahred Nenrayhil
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Toheuth • Wild Mage
Gahred may cast spells as a 5th level wizard. After Gahred casts a spell which is highter level than himself, he must succeed with a magic skill check (DC 15) or the spell is canceled.
"Gahred's discovered a new form of magic - sometimes it works, sometimes we run like mad." - Keziah

name: Garrotte
effect:
Weapon
This character adds +5 to his or her melee strike rolls that target a spent character.
We are the only animal that remains on good terms with our victims - right up until we eat them.

name: Gethseme Steelshard
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Unique
Princess of Rockhome
Gethseme is both a fighter and a rogue.
Gethseme enters play from your hand as if she were level 5.
Where there is no hope, there is also no fear.

name: Ghed Lionel
effect:
Deverenian • Astral(even strikes miss)
Stormwraith
Spend Order: Target a Deverenian in play. If Ghed succeeds with a magic save (DC 15), remove one wound from the target.
"Ghed is an ancient title of respect, given to those subsumed by th'Storm. Learn it well, Euain... " - Slayer the Unkind

name: Golgoth
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Astral(even strikes miss) • Abyssal
Order: Once per game, attach a 1st level wizard spell to Golgoth. While attached, Golgoth can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and Golgoth were a wizard.
"A golgoth took me father. He fought to the end, cuttin' an' screamin' all the way. If I die like that, I'll be content." - Rage

name: Gravity Flux
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a chracter in play. Until the end of the turn, that chracters counts as 3 characters for determining illegal ranks.
"The wraiths of the Storm are not undead. They still live, frozen spirits in rotted flesh. Each has sworn an oath of blood to the Storm. Its spirit, the realm of its creation, sustains them. If the Stormwraiths leave its side for too long... they will die." - Keziah

name: Great Leap
effect:
Barbarian only.
Spend Order: Move this chracter forward or backward up to three ranks.
Edge leapt over the edge of the precipice, determined to follow the Abyssal Lord, but he was too late - it had already vanished into the chasms above.

name: Halberd
effect:
Weapon
React: Spend the Halberd after an opposing character plays a react during a melee strike targeting this fighter. Cancel the react.
"Lucien, hear me. What I do, I do for the elves. My allies are my own, but my heart is with the forest." - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Hammer Toss
effect:
React: Before picking the target for a melee strike, you may target a character one rank further away. After the strike, discard one Weapon attached to this fighter (if he or she has one equipped).
"Don't be so proud, Sir William. The dwarf certainly seems to know what he's talking about... " - Frederik Lahr

name: Hand of Destuction
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer one wound and move backward one rank.
"Wizards are gods among men." - Theoloc

name: Hand of the Sun
effect:
React: Play before a character in your army makes a save roll. Add this cleric's level to the die roll.
"Leave this place, paladin. Though I bear you no ill will, you are not welcomed here." - Kerebus

name: Hearth
effect:
Dwarf
Ranged strikes performed by Hearth receive +2 to the die roll.
These humans count their days by hours, the slow crawl of the sun across the sky. We dwarves count time by the march of out feet - and our 'night' is an eternity long.

name: Hember's Sigil
effect:
Unique
All Dwarves in this rank have +2 AC.
"A nation is not a place. It is a people." - Heart

name: Howling Rain
effect:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Spend all Steeds in play. Until the end of the turn, any character who maneuvers becomes stunned, and all Steeds enter play spent.
"It came down so heavy we could hardly see the path. I looked at Vogurn. He smiled that awful smile and said, 'Nothrog camp in the lowlands.'" - Jemman

name: Hurricane Gauntlets
effect:
Gauntlet
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to perform a +6 ranged strike.
"The deepest oceans are as nothing to the spirits. They walk the rivers, and steal the breath from drowning sailors. Their power... our strength." - Takh

name: Icetalon
effect:
Bow • Fighter and Rogue only.
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a ranged strike.
An ancient bow, made, it is said, from the bone of the Great Dragon himself.

name: Instructed by Rren'the
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to this fighter. While it's attached, the fighter has the text "May equip 2 Weapons."
"C'mon, you squabs. You can fighter better'n that!" - Rren'the

name: Invoke Spirit
effect:
React: Play before this wizard declares the target of a spell. If the spell targets one or more characters at least one rank away, the target(s) of the spell may be one additional rank away.
"Every item has a soul within it, he told me... A stolen reflection, a memory, some piece of a greater whole... " - Euain

name: Ivory Ring
effect:
Spend React: Before another character in your army makes a ranged strike roll, add +5 to the die roll.
"It is carved from the tusk of the Rathemen's great beasts. It holds their power." - Rakhu Mennanakh

name: Jackals of Mourn
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal(odd strikes miss)
Blink Dogs • May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, if Jackals of Mourn are in rank 4 or higher, move forward three ranks.
Order: Move backward three ranks.
"The city of Mourn has fallen to Bascaron, and nothing is left but waste and the echoes of their people." - Jehricho

name: Jaridesse
effect:
Elf • Assassin
Jaridesse gains +3 ATK while making a melee strike against a spent character.
"I've never seen such hatred burn with such a cold flame. I do not know what Jaridesse has against the Grey One, but the flame with be quenched - or it will destroy her." - Artheon

name: Jehricho
effect:
Mercenary • Priest of Bascaron
Spend Order: Target a character up to two ranks away. The target gains the Monster trait until the end of the turn.
"Half of the day belongs to the moon. Half of the world should rightfully be ours."

name: Jump Back!
effect:
React: Play after this character suffers one or more wounds from a melee strike or ranged strike. Reduce the number of wounds to zero. This character is stunned.
"Jemman, get back!" Serah screamed, watching as the elven arrows pierced his flesh.

name: Just Part of the Job
effect:
React: After this rogue rolls a die, add 2 to the die roll.
"First you must learn to walk. Then you can try to run." - Kun Hull

name: Kcarrn Fal
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank. The target has -3 AC until the end of the turn
"When he eats them, where do they go?" - Timothy Windson

name: Kharban
effect:
Nothrog
Kharban gains +4 AC against ranged strikes.
I'm just a soldier. I don't make decisions, and i don't give commands. But I'm the one with the most important job of all. I do the killing.

name: KoTaahl
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • VoTaurr
If KoTaahl is in rank 5 or higher, he has the action: "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character in another army's last rank", and all characters in another army's last rank have the action "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against KoTaahl".
"Such noble creatures. Such awesome magics. I'm rather proud of them... " - Sorscha

name: KoVarth
effect:
Nothrog • Monster • VoTaurr
KoVarth can equip a fighter Weapon.
React: Once per turn, after KoVarth spends to cast a spell, ready KoVarth.
Minotaurs are born with magic in their souls.

name: Krow Imp
effect:
Familiar
Spend Order: Target an Astral or Ethereal character. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned.
Imps can see through the very dimensions that surround us - and more, their gaze can petrify those who walk such planes.

name: Kul of Clan Tergoth
effect:
Nothrog • Monster • Giant
Hellbringer's Legion • Frost Giant
React: Before Kul makes a melee strike roll, subtract 5 from the die roll. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"Trust me on this one, little man. It's bloody cold in hell... "

name: Lady Tornhawk
effect:
Mercenary
Lady Tornhawk inflicts an additional wound whenever she hits a Monster with a melee strike.
"Through tested by trials of spirit and skill, I will win my way to the ancient Temple of Lore. There I will face the Loremaster and learn the truth - as the Seers have foretold."

name: Lance
effect:
Weapon
This weapon provides no ATK bonus if this character does not have a Steed equipped.
Revan nodded. "It will have to do."

name: Learcat
effect:
Familiar
+2 Skill.
React: Spend the Learcat after this wizard performs a save roll. You may reroll the die.
"Ssh, little ones. Though the night is dark, and hope is all but lost, you should have no fear. I am with you." - Navdai

name: Lezheer Gem
effect:
Fighter and Rogue only.
React: Spend Lezheer Gem before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. The target may be one additional rank away.
"Just follow the gleam of the red jewel. It will show you where to aim." - Aeshe Wispbane

name: Light of Truth
effect:
Good characters only.
React: Play after this character rolls a die to add 2 to the result.
"We cannot stand alone, Aenne. We must draw unto us a conspiracy of light." - Bruin Lenore

name: Loot
effect:
React: Play after this character kills an opposing Monster. Search your deck for an item, show it to the other players, and add it to your hand.
Seraphina smiled. "I'll follow Anton. When we fine the tome, we'll be richer than angels... "

name: Lord Winter
effect:
Elf Warlord • Unique • Ethereal(odd strikes miss) • House Syneri
Wounds suffered by Lord Winter may not be reduced or removed.
React: After Lord Winter suffers a wound, ready him.
Like the cold touch of love destroyed, so too is winter found in the embrace of death denied.

name: Machine of Lukkot
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • Hellbringer's Legion
May not equip items • May not maneuver.
Machine of Lukkot inflicts an extra wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.
Order: Spend another character in this rank to move Machine of Lukkot forward or backward one rank.
"Push, boys, and put your backs inot it!"

name: Madness
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin
"Never. Never. Never. Not while I live."

name: Madriga's Quick-Strike
effect:
Order: Play when your opponent has no cards in his hand. This rogue performs a melee strike targeting one of that player's characters one rank away.
"Once you have won, walk away. There's no room for pride on the battlefield." - Madriga's Treatise of Swordsmanship

name: Magic Missiles
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a number of consecutive +0 ranged strikes equal to this wizard's level. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to the die roll.
"One fewer obstacle to the Empire."

name: Magic Shifting
effect:
React: Play after this wizard declares the target(s) of a spell. Magic saves produced by the spell have +3 DC, and ranged strikes produced by the spell add +3 to the die roll.
"With the right word, even an Empire can change." - Bruin Lenoire

name: Makusog
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.
"Mount up, boys," Maddawc snarled. "It's time to clear the road."

name: Mantle of Control
effect:
Spend Order: Spend a Monster of opposite alignment to this character.
Spend Order: Ready a lower level Monster that is the same alignment as this character.  If the monster has already attacked this turn, it cannot attack again.

name: Markappal Basilysk
effect:
Dwarf • Monster
Melee strikes performed by Basilysk ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.
React: Once per turn, after a character misses Basilysk with a melee strike, that character suffers one wound.

name: Master Caudecus
effect:
Deverenian • Astral(even strikes miss)
Stormwraith • Vanguard of the Storm
"Fierce riders prowl the edges of the storm. Those who seek to enter must challenge their Master, or be destroyed."

name: Maxt Stormcrow
effect:
Elf • Ranger
Order: Once per turn, perform a +0 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"... for the payment and price of all treachery is death." - Lord Corwin Lorath of Rellion

name: Modred of Carcius
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Unique
Astral(even strikes miss) • Stormwraith
Hierophant of the Storm
Modred has +1 ATK and +1 AC for each other Astral Deverenian character in your army.
There are none so blind as those who will not see.

name: Mounted Charge
effect:
Order: Spend a Steed equipped by this fighter to move him or her forward one rank. If this moves the fighter into the 1st rank, and he or she is ready, the fighter may immediately perform an attack with a +5 ATK bonus.
"Even the skies shall become battlefields of blood... " - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Murgan
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian • Monster
Mountain Troll • May not equip a Weapon.
Order: Once per turn, remove a wound from Murgan.
Trolls are the very soul of nightmare, each one born of screams. We tear apart the silence of night, and feast on the bones of dreamers.

name: Myreth Training
effect: React:

name: Nothrog Bow
effect:
Weapon • Bow • Fighter and Rogue only.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"Maybe if Nothrog had better bows, they'd be better archers. No wonder they can't hit the broad side of Baraxton." - Davon Ironthorn

name: Nothrog Warbanner
effect:
Unique
All Nothrog in this rank have +2 ATK.
"And I looked, and saw a pale horse upon the horizon. Its name was Death, and the banner it carried was the harbinger of Everlasting War... " - Nassiral Hate

name: Othoreos
effect:
Elf • Dythanus • Priest of Blood
Orthoreos may cast "Necromancer only" wizard spells as if he were a 3rd level wizard.
If you have your enemy at your mercy, and do not kill him, then you are your own worst foe.

name: Pact of Bone
effect:
React: Once per turn, after this character spends to cast a spell, inflict one wound on this character to ready him or her.
"I can help you achieve immortality... but there is a price." - Othoreos

name: Peredur
effect:
Deverenian • Necromancer
Royal Chiurgeon • Loth
In the dark halls beneath the Imperial Palace, the Chiurgeons of Order Loth do whatever they must in order to keep the Emperor alive.

name: Pitfall
effect:
Dwarf • Ranger
Spend Order: Before the next melee strike roll this turn that targets a character in this rank, Pitfall performs a melee strike targeting the attacking character with a base ATK of +8.
So much for ten-by-ten corridors.

name: Qephire
effect:
Elf • Druid • House Calix
Spend Order: Target a 1st or 2nd level character up to two ranks away. Move the target forward or backward one rank.
Winter burns away the forest's weakest parts, leaving strength in its harrowed wake.

name: Reinholt
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Andover
Reinholt may play fighter action cards.
"Neus is a gentle god, but he is also protector of his faithful. You pray for their souls, Frederik; I will give them justice."

name: Revan
effect:
Deverenian • Verdatha Master
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Steed, show it to the other players, then add it to your hand.
"Shh, now. Th' Storm comes soon, proud one, and you shall fly anon... "

name: Rise, and Obey!
effect:
Summoner only.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a character, show it to the other players, and add it to your hand.
Sorscha smiled. "I will reclaim what has been stolen from me... "

name: Ruanned Wadreth
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • Jalpa • Trapper
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. If the target is a Monster, the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
I've never taken  a human life, but these beasts deserve their fate.

name: Run Like Hell
effect:
Order: Discard all items equipped by this character and move him backward any number of ranks (minimum 1 rank).
"That's it. We're finished!" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Ruthless
effect:
ATK +7 AC 15  Skill +4 Hit Points 2
Dwarf • Rockhome Guard
Ruthless gains +5 ATK when targetting a Monster with a melee strike.
React: Perform after a melee strike or ranged strike against Ruthless. If the strike hit Ruthless, perform a melee strike.
"Rac says that one of the Abyssals escaped to the surface. Now its my job to bring him down.

name: Sanguicorn
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monster
May not equip items.
Sanguicorn inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike and the die roll was odd.
Order: Once per turn, move forward one rank.
"The last unicorn is dead and gone, la, la. Only the dark brothers remain to feast on the flesh of their companions. - Vehdred

name: Scepter of the Seven
effect:
Unique
All Elves in this rank have +1 ATK and +3 skill.
"The Seven Houses will stand - Calix, Syneri, Glyn, Dythanus, Rowan, Wyrian and Tanisq - until the world shall end."

name: Sceth Hellbringer
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique • Giant
Siegemaster • Fire Giant
Sceth inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn, ready a spent(not stunned) character with the Siege trait.
Come not between the Warmaker and his wraith.

name: Scourge of Dythanus
effect:
Level 4-Cleric
Order: This cleric targets a character and moves all wounds from the target to other characters in your army.  You cannot move more wounds to a character than his or her hit points.
React: Play after a character in this cleric's army suffers one or more wounds.  The cleric suffers the wounds instead.

name: Sea of Flame
effect:
Spend Order: Kill all 1st level characters in play.
Perenor screamed as the flames engulfed him. The Templar of Llyr was no more... but his hammer, the legacy of his line, wsa melted into solid rock. It would remain there until the next hero came to claim it for his own.

name: Searing Light
effect:
Good characters only.
Spend Order: This cleric targets an evil character up to two ranks away, who must make a number of magic saves (DC 11) equal to this cleric's level. The target suffers one wound for each save he or she fails.
"It burns... how it burns!" - SS-ssaurth

name: Seraphina Corazon
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Look at the top ten cards of your deck. Seraphina may immediately equip one item from among those that she can legally equip. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.
Anton, Anton. You're far too soft-hearted.

name: Shadow of Lies
effect:
Evil Paladin only.
Order: This paladin targets a good character up to two ranks away. The target moves back one rank.
"It's us or them, Wallence. You know it, and so do I." - Vogurn

name: Sigilsword
effect:
Weapon
Melee strikes performed by this character ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.
A blade as true as virtue, with an edge that cuts like vice.

name: Signon's Disciples
effect:
Deverenian • Monster
Astral (even strikes miss)
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
"Unnumbered knights have followed Signon's steps into the Storm. Didst thou truly think they would ne'er return?" - Magnus Arcadis

name: Sir Corwin Lorath
effect:
Deverenian • Rellion • Templar
Sir Corwin has +4 AC against ranged strikes.
"Never ask the price of the deeds I must do... " - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Sir Guerin
effect:
Deverenian • Astral(even strikes miss)
Stormwraith
The silence within the Storm is so infinite, so deep, that one can hear the very heart of the world, pounding deep beneath the surface.

name: Sling Shot
effect:
Bow
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to perform a +4 ranged strike.
"If I can pick it up, then it is a weapon." - Jamr ibn Al-as

name: Sneak
effect:
React: Play after an action targets this rogue. If the rogue succeeds with a perception check (DC 18), the action is canceled. The rogue cannot cancel an attack with this card.
"Even Nightwalkers aren't perfect. I assure you, though... we're persistent." - Devon Harper

name: Snow Elk
effect:
Steed
Paladin only.
Order: Discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank.
"VoTaurr maidens are as beautiful as stars. They fight like warriors, and rule their lands like kings." - KoTaahl

name: Spell Mastery
effect:
Order: Name a wizard action card. Until the end of the game, this character is +1 level for casting that spell.
Anton does the work for me. When he is weak from the fight, I will simply take my book from his cold, dead hands.

name: Spirit Singing
effect:
Bard only.
Spend Order: This Bard targets a spent character of equal or lower level. Ready the target character.
"I do not order the spirits. I entreat them." - Elegy

name: Squire Igerne
effect:
Deverenian • Imperial Guard
Deverenians adjacent to Igerne have +2 AC.
"The hawk has returned, and with bad news, Lady. The wizard hath escaped us once again, with the help of a half-blood Tremayne... "

name: Staff of the Traveler
effect:
Unique
All Mercenaries in this rank have +1 ATK and +1 AC.
"Do not seek to follow in my footsteps. See to find what I sought." - Syneri the Archmage

name: Steel Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • You must have a level 3 or higher cleric in your army to bring Steel Gargoyle into play. 
Spend React: Before a melee strike roll targetting Steel Gargoyle, target a Weapon equipped by the attacker. After the strike, discard the weapon.
"Vain, light-loving creatures. Best not take one to the surface. We'll lose it to the sun." - Sky

name: Stirges
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after the Stirges perform a melee strike that hits the target, the Stirges perform an additional melee strike.
"There are some things that all adventurers have to go through, just to call yourself 'experienced'. This'd be one of 'em." - Jack Casey

name: Stoneblight Cyclops
effect:
Nothrog • Monster
Before a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting Stoneblight Cyclops, the attacker may perform the following action: "React: Give Cyclops +10 AC until the end of this strike. This strike inflicts two additional wounds if it hits."
"The Southern Mountains, now, they ain't as hospitable, even underground... " - Stalwart

name: Storm Crows
effect:
Deverenian • Monster • Astral(even strikes miss)
May not equip items.
"Thousands of them came, like a black veil across the sky, heralding the beginning of the Storm's Passing... " - Cardinal Scelus

name: Stormwraith's Oath
effect:
Armor
This character gains the Astral trait (even strikes miss).
Join us...

name: Su-tatra
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip Armor or Shield items.
Su-tatra has -4 AC while spent.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike. If the strike is successful, the target is spent instead of wounded.
"Effective. Graceful. Efficient. Methinks these Sutek aren't as primitive as we have been led to believe." - Duchess Brymin

name: Tarpit Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Monster • Gargoyle 
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Tarpit Gargoyle or bring one into play. Tarpit Gargoyle has +4 AC against ranged strikes.
Not all of Sjonegaard's brood can be trusted. The more twisted the stone from which they spring, the more corrupt their hearts.

name: Ter-Soth
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Unique
Astral(even strikes miss) • Abyssal
Order: Once per game, Ter-Soth attaches a wizard spell of a lower level than himself. While attached, Ter-Soth can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand.
I will reign.

name: The 9 Cats of Hell
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
"An ancient legend, good sir, and one to be believed. I saw them once, long ago. Just being that close turned my hair white. I can't tell you what they did to th others... If I thought too much about it, I'd go mad." - Lord Rhys Melnorac of Myerdeth

name: Three Drops of Poison
effect:
Order: This rogue targets a character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 11, DC 15 if this rogue is an Assassin) or suffer one wound.
One for Terak. One for Robert. One for Anton. Neus help us all, if it comes to this...

name: Thunder Mace
effect:
Weapon
When this character performs a melee strike targeting an Astral or Ethereal character, he or she gains +2 ATK for the strike, and ignores the effects of the astral or ethereal trait.
"Bear the arms of righteousness, daughter. You will need their might." - Modred, Hierophant of the Storm

name: Tidal Blast
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard performs a +6 ranged strike. If the ranged strike hits, the target suffers one wound then moves back one rank.
"My elven companion and I take exception to trespassers. We've an Emperor to kill, you see, and have no time for idle visits." - Sir Corwin Lorath

name: Too Stubborn to Die
effect:
React: Play after this character is killed by a melee strike or ranged strike. Remove all wounds from the character who is no longer considered killed. Kill the character at the end of the turn.
"I ain't got time to bleed!" - Avalanche

name: Torch
effect:
Weapon
When this character is performing a melee strike, AC bonuses from any source other than the target's Armor, Shield, and Helm are ignored.

name: Tracking
effect:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Play after a character in another army moves forward or backward one rank. Move this character forward or backward one rank.
"Find her for me, Grukth, and we'll split the bounty. What could you do with over seventy thousand golden Claw?" - Donovan Che'har

name: Umberhulk
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, target an opposing ready character in an adjacent rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
"They burrow through solid stone as fast as you can run. They're to blame for the chasms that the Abyssals crawl up. If we could kill all the umberhulks, we'd be getting somewhere." - Ruthless

name: Unclean Spirits
effect:
Elf • Undead
Ethereal(odd strikes miss)
React: After Unclean Spirits inflict a wound with a melee strike or spell, remove one wound from them.
"Three generations of my people were forced to lay their bodies down in death. It would be wrong not to allow them to be first to find revenge." - Tepheroth

name: Uriel
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Warlord •  Unique
Astral(even strikes miss) • Celestial
Uriel inflicts two additional wounds whenever he hits with a melee strike.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
I wander in Death's own shadow; never to truly live, and never to die

name: Vision
effect:
Dwarf • Seer
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to draw a card.
"There will come a time when you regret faith in Poison, my lord," the seer whispered. Xod's eyes were haunted. "Has there ever been a time when I have not?"

name: Vision of Thunder
effect:
Seer only.
Order: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may return them to the top of your deck in the same order, or shuffle them into your deck.
"I have never known a seer with Alhana's vision. If our plan is to succeed, we must find a way to steal her Sight." - Aenne the Tempest

name: Vorg
effect:
Elf • Seductress
Spend Order: Spend a lower-level ready character up to two ranks away.
"Ten men lie lost in that forest already, sleeping deep beneath new-fallen snow and dreaming of her eyes." - Reinholt

name: Weapon Focus
effect:
Fighters play this card as a 2nd level action.
Order: Attach Weapon Focus to a Weapon equipped by this character. While attached, this weapon gains +2 ATK.
"Everyone's so frightened of Rathe, but I tell you this: without that human forged dagger of his... he's nothing." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Weapon Specialization
effect:
Order: Attach this card to a Weapon equipped by this fighter that has a 'Weapon Focus' attached. While this card is attached, the weapon gains +3 ATK, and inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.
"The trick of it is not to wield the blade, but to let the blade wield you" - Madriga's Treatise of Swordsmanship

name: Windwalk
effect:
Shaman only.
Spend Order: Move a character in your army forward or backward up to two ranks.
Uriel the fallen angel, light of the southern sky. Your star shall burn out long before your shame.

name: Woundwraith
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal
(odd strikes miss) • May not equip items.
Woundwraith has -8 AC until the end of the turn if it has performed any action this turn other than a Maneuver.
"More sadistic Nothrog use them for prison guards. Woundwraiths feed on insanity, and delight in causing pain. There's no such thing as a temporary sentence in Nassiral Hate's lands" - Sali

name: Xanthis
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monster • Scholar
May not equip a Steed. Xanthis can cast spells as if he were a 2nd level wizard.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks.
"Feed me no more of your lies, Palethis," Elenitakis snarled. "There are no more centaurs."

name: Xerxes
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • Monster
May not equip a Steed.
Spend Order: Move Forward or Backward two ranks.
Be content with what you are, and wish not change; do not dread your last day, nor long for it.

name: Yemat
effect:
Nothrog • Scout
Order: Once per turn, perform a +2 ranged strike.
Death hangs in the air like an archer's kiss. Though the sun shines above the northern plains, we will send them shadow.

name: Zephiros
effect:
Elf • Undead • Death Knight
Ethereal(odd strikes miss)
If Zephiros does not have a Weapon equipped, wounds inflicted by his melee strikes may not be reduced.
A cold wind blows through the Lands of the Accord, turning hearts to snow and blades to ice.

name: Zhul
effect:
ATK +9/+4 AC 9 Skill +1 Hit Points 2
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal
Astral(even strikes miss) • Spellstealer
Order: Once per game, attach a 1st or 2nd level wizard spell to Zhul. While attached, Zhul can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and Zhul were a wizard.
"We told you what was to come, and you would not listen. Now you will burn." - Truth
